fields.description:
Android application not working.

<Widget id="drawer" src="kr.yostudio.drawer" platform="android">
		<View id="menuWrap" role="leftView">
			<Require id="leftMenu" src="win_leftMenu"></Require>
		</View>
		<Window id="win_drawer" platform="android" role="centerWindow" >
			<ActionBar onHomeIconItemSelected="onMenuButtonClick" title="L K Nakashe Consultants" displayHomeAsUp="true" ></ActionBar>
			<Menu id="menu" platform="android">
				<MenuItem  title="Call us" icon="/images/drawer_contact.png" onClick="onCallUsClick" showAsAction="Ti.Android.SHOW_AS_ACTION_IF_ROOM"/>
			</Menu>
		</Window>
	</Widget>

comments.body:
It looks like you are trying to place a (top-level) {{<Window>}} instance next to views, which either need to be part of the window or be in a separate view that is require'd by another top-level window. The error itself suggests that there is no action bar to configure, so it fails.

Also, unrelated, it seems like {{selectedBackgroundColor}} is marked as deprecated although it is not in the docs. [~bimmel] + [~ybanev] for the rescue!

<Widget id="drawer" src="kr.yostudio.drawer" platform="android">
		<View id="menuWrap" role="leftView">
			<Require id="leftMenu" src="win_leftMenu"></Require>
		</View>
		<View id="win_drawer" platform="android" role="centerWindow" >
			<ActionBar onHomeIconItemSelected="onMenuButtonClick" title="L K Nakashe Consultants" displayHomeAsUp="true"></ActionBar>
			<Menu id="menu" platform="android">
				<MenuItem  title="Call us" icon="/images/drawer_contact.png" onClick="onCallUsClick" showAsAction="Ti.Android.SHOW_AS_ACTION_IF_ROOM"/>
			</Menu>
		</View>
	</Widget>




{color:red}Error:{color}

{color:red}[ERROR] :  TiExceptionHandler: (main) [1063,7161] ----- Titanium Javascript Runtime Error -----
[ERROR] :  TiExceptionHandler: (main) [0,7161] - In /alloy/widgets/kr.yostudio.drawer/controllers/widget.js:158,20
[ERROR] :  TiExceptionHandler: (main) [0,7161] - Message: Uncaught TypeError: this.topWindow.open is not a function
[ERROR] :  TiExceptionHandler: (main) [0,7161] - Source:     this.topWindow.open(args);
[ERROR] :  V8Exception: Exception occurred at /alloy/widgets/kr.yostudio.drawer/controllers/widget.js:158: Uncaught TypeError: this.topWindow.open is not a function{color}
Its an drawer which i used "kr.yostudio.drawer" js file
I don't get any solution to fix it please help me to  solve it or any alternative navigation drawer to use.
Hello [~rohit], "kr.yostudio.drawer" is this you created or a third party drawer? If it's third party drawer you should try reaching them. Thanks.
Hello [~rohit], What is the update of your issue? Can you get back to us on the previous comment?
Created PR https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/10256 to add the deprecated notice to the selectedBackgroundColor property.

So this is a bit more complicated I assume. On iOS, it is not deprecated, on Android it is. We should find out why it was deprecated and how we should proceed. Reopening and moving to TIMOB for further investigation. *EDIT*: See TIMOB-26304 for further info.
